com.radiotelescope.security.service

Class UserDetailsServiceImpl

  • com.radiotelescope.security.service.UserDetailsServiceImpl

  • public class UserDetailsServiceImpl

    This service is a concrete implementation of the UserDetailsService

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserDetailsServiceImpl(IUserRepository userRepo, IUserRoleRepository userRoleRepo)
      This service is a concrete implementation of the UserDetailsService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IUserRepository getUserRepo()
      the
      IUserRoleRepository getUserRoleRepo()
      the
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      Override of the UserDetailsService.loadUserByUsername used to load the user by the username (email) so it can create a class UserDetailsImpl object. It checks to make sure the email refers to a valid class User Entity. If it does not, (or the email is null) it willthrow an error. It will then grab all of the user's roles and create the class UserDetailsImpl
      void setUserRepo(IUserRepository p)
      the
      void setUserRoleRepo(IUserRoleRepository p)
      the

    • Method Detail

      • loadUserByUsername

        public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)

        Override of the UserDetailsService.loadUserByUsername used to load the user by the username (email) so it can create a class UserDetailsImpl object. It checks to make sure the email refers to a valid class User Entity. If it does not, (or the email is null) it willthrow an error. It will then grab all of the user's roles and create the class UserDetailsImpl

        Parameters:
        username - the class User email
        Returns:
        a class UserDetailsImpl object
        See Also:
        class UserDetailsImpl, class User, class UserDetailsImpl
